item.description:
Come join the fun at The Greatest Bar this coming Sunday to watch the Patriots/Giants game.  The Greatest Bar has kindly reserved the 2nd floor lounge area for our group!  Please just ask for the MeetUp group or my name (Isabel).  Game time is 4:15pm but I should be there about 3pm or so.  Come early to get yourself a prime seat.  ;) 

The Greatest Bar is super conveniently located next to the TD Garden and on the Green and Orange Lines and Commuter Rail at North Station.  Everyone is responsible for their own food/drink. PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU GO. 

This event is cross-listed with Social Fun and Red Sox Natives. HOPE TO SEE YOU THERE!
item.how_to_find_us: We have the 2nd floor lounge reserved for us. I'll be in my Welker jersey.
item.name: Patriots Viewing Party -- Pats v. Giants
